channel.title: CS193P on Flying blind - coding nonsense
channel.description: Recent content in CS193P on Flying blind - coding nonsense

item.title: HelloPoly - Stanford University CS193P iPhone application development
item.description: Nope, never attended Stanford… This was a very famous iTunesU webinar in 2010 after Apple introduced iPhone SDK in 2008. I watched it several times and of course I had no clue most of topics. Then slowly I started to understand, or I thought I did untill this famous mind-term assigment came. As far as I remember I worked on it almost a month, while the deadline was only a week or two.
